name: Where Angels Meet
summary: Where Angels Meet is a cinematic VR experience that follows the life story of a young man named Marcus. As his guardian angel, you'll have a unique view of key moments in his life. As the story unfolds, you'll be emotionally challenged by Marcus' life experiences and hopefully gain a new appreciation for your own position in life.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Where Angels Meet: A Cinematic VR Experience - AVAILABLE NOW for Oculus Rift
